resources.string:
First, thanks for trying this software. If you want to make it better or just say thanks, send your ideas or bug reports to michix5d@gmail.com. If you just want to swear about me or this app, please send it somewhere else.

This Application is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 unported (CC BY-SA 3.0). That means you can copy this app to your friends without getting in licensing trouble - please share it!

This App does not send any personal information. But when downloading contents via this app, information about your device will be sent:
- display resolution and density
- version of this app
- an unique id (randomly generated)
I can\'t read, don\'t want to read, can\'t understand or can\'t accept the conditions of use.
I have not understood, can\'t or don\'t want to read the conditions of use but accept them.
I\'ve read, understood the conditions of use and want to accept them.
Thanks for buying my old washing machine!\n\nJust a joke. Come on, the text isn\'t very long. Do you want to read it now?

You are using Spirit Second Edition, written by Michael Wodniok. Thanks for trying and using this app. Contact for ideas and bug reports: michix5d@gmail.com

Used tools:
- Eclipse
- Android SDK + ADT
- Oracle JRE
- Inkscape
- My Sony St25i

string-array.name: sb_newsintervals
string-array.item: At every launch of the app

resources.string: Update interval for news. News will be loaded at startup of the app in set interval.
Sorry, the news where not found.
